Travolta's illustrious filmography extends beyond his popular roles, showcasing his impressive range as an actor. Some of his more recent memorable performances include "Pulp Fiction" (1994), "Face/Off" (1997), "Gotti" (1996), "The Boy" (2016), and the recent "Looking for Magical Love" (2021).
